thread.title: Wall St plunges, S&P 500 erases 2018's gains

title: Wall St plunges, S&P 500 erases 2018's gains
text:
Wall St plunges, S&P 500 erases 2018's gains 11:00pm GMT - 01:42 
U.S. stocks plunged in highly volatile trading on Monday as investors grappled with rising bond yields and potentially firming inflation. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. stocks plunged in highly volatile trading on Monday as investors grappled with rising bond yields and potentially firming inflation. Aleksandra Michalska reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2BaTEbf
